sections.heading: Acknowledgments; oaths; power to administer
sections.text: The register of deeds shall have power to take acknowledgments and administer oaths and to certify the same under his or her hand and official seal.SourceLaws 1887, c. 30, § 32, p. 377;R.S.1913, § 5620;C.S.1922, § 4947;C.S.1929, § 26-1205;R.S.1943, § 23-15
